title: 97x12: Discussion of 14 Fundamental Principles of E.O. 12674; Development of E-Filing System for Confidential Financial Disclosure
summary: OGE does not have the authority to waive the application of the 14 fundamental principles established by Executive Order 12674 or the implementing regulation at 5 C.F.R. § Part 2635. OGE authorizes a pilot test of electronic filing for confidential financial disclosure system.
